name: A Bro's Guide to Convention Safety
name_original: A Bro's Guide to Convention Safety
description:
This game will guide you to your first convention, where each decision you make will have a huge impact on how safe and successful your trip will be. Meet a colorful cast of characters who will test your knowledge on proper convention procedure as you explore the venues, play some games, and check out some epic cosplays. By delivering pro tips and safety quips on the ins and outs of being a proper convention go-er, this game will ensure that your next trip to any convention is the best it can be.
